name: Drive US Army Off Road: Truck Missile Launcher
name_original: Drive US Army Off Road: Truck Missile Launcher
description:
Are u ready to explore the army trained shooting in battle ship gaming zone? US US Missile Launcher game uses hale patent missile launcher equipped with devilish US ballistic and cruise missiles. Take the control of world strongest missile system in military attack 3D game. Modern war army launcher truck game is a best game for fighting lovers. Simulate your army truck driving skills with army missiles launcher track 3d. Like Army mission games your responsibilities start now. 3d army truck is equipped with state of the art missile launcher. Simulate the army truck driving expertise to approach the destination in time. Battleship has no excuse so hurry up troops load the Rapier missile and destroy the gunships of enemies. Attack with Sea Cat, and Sea Dart to hush up the enemy’s Missiles warships. Don't take it easy your country defense is at risk, enemies attacked with sea warships, drones and Missiles. Defend your motherland in deserts, hills, seas and repel them to hell.

In this US Missile Launcher Elite war game you have chance to become a soldier from normal citizen. In this combat your job is to become a missile controller & complete such a impossible mission. Launch the missile & air the target. Lots of rivals army Missile & camp you have destroy in area. Country gives you such a big responsibility to protect your territories. Now You have survive & defense against enemy force. Your Killer attack is mandatory to protect your country. You have to win against this army clash by surgical missile strike.

Features of US Missile Launcher:

• 3D Army truck missile launcher simulator which has never been so real before.
• Amazing and varying landscape to challenge a gamer’s driving and gaming skills.
• 3D effects and war zone aura.
• Exceptional sound effects and background music to represent the battlefield scenario.
• Awesome and challenging Army Missions in each of the 10 levels.
• Predefined set of missile ranges to launch the missile and hit the enemy target.

How to play US Missile Launcher:
• Tap to Turn left.
• Tap to Turn right.
• Hit brake to stop.
• Tap throttle to accelerate.
Like a nuclear weapons war game. Dozens of challenges at this game use strategies such as dodging, running, aiming and shooting to defeat your enemies. Become the greatest hero. On this game you have shown your shooting skills against the best training terrorist and dangerous enemies. On this game have multiple difficult levels and multiple environments to play this Missile battle game.

Start the game and enter the city area and first of all you haven strike the enemy so use your weapon and break the head of enemy. And enter the battle area and attack on the terrorist and receive the life kit. On this game have lots of helicopter has attack on you. You are army officer so attack on the apache and destroy the all enemies and become a best Missile shooter.
